This is the list you should be using, in order:   

-Restart Gmod.
-Restart Steam.
-Restart Computer.
-Reinstall PERP Materials.
-Defragment Game Cache.
-Verify Integrity.
-Delete "clientregistry.blob."
-Enable "Game Mode" if your Antivirus software has such a feature.
-Temporarily disable Antivirus/Firewall.
-Add corrresponding hl2.exe to your Antivirus software's exceptions list.
-Fiddle with corresponding hl2.exe's target properties.
-Reinstall Gmod.
-Reinstall Steam.
-Google  like you've never googled before.
-Format Computer.

  Basically, just run down the list and every time you do a step, try to play PERP without crashing.
